TopicTitle: K100: Completed Tech Tree Save + Funds

Articles.Content:
*K100 is a savegame that has the Tech Tree unlocked, 250 million funds, neutral reputation and Level 3 buildings.*

*Made for those that like Sandbox but don't want to have Mission Control, Administration Building, Research and Development, and science instruments restricted.*

***How to install:***

1. Drop the "RENAME ME!" folder into your "saves" folder (located in your KSP directory (that's the folder that contains "ksp.exe"))

2. Rename the "RENAME ME!" folder into what you want your save to be named. (Example: Space Program 1)

***Download:***

[Mediafire](http://download1482./9rlq811pvpqg/x0vl17wq28lnxec/K100.zip)

[Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/s/udzj0flt0gsmrpv/K100.zip?dl=0)

> 
> I believe it would qualify as an "Add-on Release." I also believe that things like this (i.e., things that aren't mods) are exactly why that forum is called "Add-on Releases" and not "Mod Releases."
